name: Golden Lens
description:
"Look through the lens and see the true colors of the world."

Golden Lens is a first person puzzle game about colors, lasers and steampunk machines.

Look through the lens and see true colors of the world.
Use machines to change them and progress to the next level.

This early prototype includes 5 levels that introduce the mechanics and provides around 5 to 10 minutes of gameplay.

In the beginning...

Golden Lens is the winner of Unreal Engine august Game Jam.
I created it solo, over a single weekend, without any outside assets other than sound effects and music (noted below).

Right now...

Since then I gathered a small team and we are working on making a proper demo with larger scale and better quality. We want to get funding and start production on a full game.

The future...

I want to create a full game that expands on the ideas of the prototype.
Open and free exploration of a steampunk world of marvelous technology and logic puzzles.

If you are interested in this game and would like to see it grow to the full title follow me here, or on twitter @theallshar.
